phrases.original: The Invites App uses digital maps to help you decide where to focus your evangelistic activity. Are you taking your group out to go sharing? Use the maps feature to find places where you're more likely to meet people who are interested. Or use it to identify places that you have not yet evangelized.
phrases.translated: The Invites App uses digital maps to help you decide where to focus your evangelistic activity. Are you taking your group out to go sharing? Use the maps feature to find places where you're more likely to meet people who are interested. Or use it to identify places that you have not yet evangelized.

phrases.original: How Maps and Users' Evangelism are Connected
phrases.translated: How Maps and Users' Evangelism are Connected

phrases.original: Maps are made possible whenever any user tags an invite with their location just before sending the invite (doing this is optional). Your mobile device can detect its own coordinates, and these coordinates will be associated with an invite if you tag it with your location.
phrases.translated: Maps are made possible whenever any user tags an invite with their location just before sending the invite (doing this is optional). Your mobile device can detect its own coordinates, and these coordinates will be associated with an invite if you tag it with your location.

phrases.original: Every map marker indicates an evangelistic success, and not just an attempt (because the invite recipient agreed to receive an invitation at that location). Red markers indicate your invites (and they are clickable, showing details). Blue markers indicate where other registered users have sent invites. You can filter how many markers will appear on a map by specifying a time range.
phrases.translated: Every map marker indicates an evangelistic success, and not just an attempt (because the invite recipient agreed to receive an invitation at that location). Red markers indicate your invites (and they are clickable, showing details). Blue markers indicate where other registered users have sent invites. You can filter how many markers will appear on a map by specifying a time range.

phrases.original: When NOT to Tag an Invite with Your Location
phrases.translated: When NOT to Tag an Invite with Your Location

phrases.original: Note: For the sake of the recipient's privacy, you should not tag an invite with your location if you are at the recipient's personal residence. Also, for the sake of accuracy, you should not tag an invite with your location if the recipient is not in your presence (e.g. don't tag invites with your location if you are sending invites from your home).
phrases.translated: Note: For the sake of the recipient's privacy, you should not tag an invite with your location if you are at the recipient's personal residence. Also, for the sake of accuracy, you should not tag an invite with your location if the recipient is not in your presence (e.g. don't tag invites with your location if you are sending invites from your home).

phrases.original: Share your Faith, Even When Time is Limited:
phrases.translated: Share your Faith, Even When Time is Limited:

phrases.original: Share all of the event's details to the recipient's device instantly, freeing you to use a brief moment to build rapport instead of fixating on details. The whole interaction can take place within one minute.
phrases.translated: Share all of the event's details to the recipient's device instantly, freeing you to use a brief moment to build rapport instead of fixating on details. The whole interaction can take place within one minute.

phrases.original: Leverage the power of calendar reminders to help recipients remember to attend, even when their device does not have a signal.
phrases.translated: Leverage the power of calendar reminders to help recipients remember to attend, even when their device does not have a signal.

phrases.original: Never again forget or overlook anyone you've invited. Make all of your follow-up calls and texts. Take notes. Create follow-up reminders to yourself, all from one convenient place.
phrases.translated: Never again forget or overlook anyone you've invited. Make all of your follow-up calls and texts. Take notes. Create follow-up reminders to yourself, all from one convenient place.

phrases.original: Use digital maps to plan your local outreach, maximizing your likelihood of meeting open people.
phrases.translated: Use digital maps to plan your local outreach, maximizing your likelihood of meeting open people.

phrases.original: If you lead a group within the church (whether a Bible Talk or even a world sector) you can easily equip your entire membership with access to the Invites App.
phrases.translated: If you lead a group within the church (whether a Bible Talk or even a world sector) you can easily equip your entire membership with access to the Invites App.
